personal_projects.title: Placemento - MCA Placement Portal
personal_projects.description: Implemented a secure and scalable MERN-stack MCA Placement Portal with robust security, role-based access, and interactive data visualization using AG Grid and AG Charts.

personal_projects.title: Leetcode Rating Predictor
personal_projects.description: A Python-based tool that predicts user ratings in LeetCode contests using machine learning. It fetches contest data, processes it, and applies a LSTM model for accurate predictions.

personal_projects.title: Personal Portfolio
personal_projects.description: Crafted an interactive portfolio website showcasing skills and achievements, optimized for multiple devices, with smooth refresh-free navigation.

personal_projects.title: Contact Manager
personal_projects.description: Engineered a full-stack MERN application to streamline contact management with complete user authentication and CRUD operations, featuring a user-friendly UI with dark/light modes.

personal_projects.title: Tour Vibes
personal_projects.description: A Travel Journal Web App built with MERN stack for sharing and discovering travel experiences.

personal_projects.title: Music Web Player
personal_projects.description: A frontend music web player application with interactive controls and playlist management.

personal_projects.title: AWS DevOps Infrastructure
personal_projects.description: Contains GitHub Actions CI/CD Pipeline codes, tests, and AWS deployment configurations for FARM stack applications.

personal_projects.title: Brainstorm Verse
personal_projects.description: A Next.js platform where brilliant minds converge and ideas collide in an inspiring symphony of creativity and innovation.

personal_projects.title: PacMan Game Unity
personal_projects.description: A classic Pac-Man game recreated using Unity Engine with C# scripting for an authentic gaming experience.

personal_projects.title: Blue Green AWS Terraform
personal_projects.description: Complete Blue-Green deployment pipeline using Terraform with automated CI/CD, containerized Node.js applications on ECS, and AWS security best practices.

personal_projects.title: Stock Market Prediction
personal_projects.description: A machine learning project for predicting stock market trends using historical data and neural networks.

personal_projects.title: Personal Portfolio
personal_projects.description: My original personal portfolio website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript showcasing my early web development skills.

personal_projects.title: Guess The Number Game
personal_projects.description: A simple interactive game where players have to guess a randomly generated number, implemented using JavaScript with an engaging UI.

collaborative_projects.title: Lingua Connect
collaborative_projects.description: An interactive online platform built on the MERN stack, connecting language learners with personalized tutors for tailored online lessons. Winner of TRINIT Hackathon.

collaborative_projects.title: MCA NITW Website
collaborative_projects.description: Official MCA Course Website for NIT Warangal, providing comprehensive information about the MCA program, faculty, and resources.

collaborative_projects.title: Placemento
collaborative_projects.description: A comprehensive placement portal for MCA NITW students, facilitating job placements and connecting students with potential employers.

collaborative_projects.title: LeetCode Among Us
collaborative_projects.description: A competitive coding platform for MCA NITW students to practice LeetCode problems together and track progress.
